channel.title: CVE Feed for AutomationDirect -- DirectLOGIC D0-06 series CPUs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AutomationDirect -- DirectLOGIC D0-06 series CPUs

item.title: CVE-2022-2004|2024-09-16T20:06:24.567Z -- automationdirect -- directlogic%20d0-06%20series%20cpus
item.description: AutomationDirect DirectLOGIC is vulnerable to a a specially crafted packet can be sent continuously to the PLC to prevent access from DirectSoft and other devices, causing a denial-of-service condition. This issue affects: AutomationDirect DirectLOGIC D0-06 series CPUs D0-06DD1 versions prior to 2.72; D0-06DD2 versions prior to 2.72; D0-06DR versions prior to 2.72; D0-06DA versions prior to 2.72; D0-06AR versions prior to 2.72; D0-06AA versions prior to 2.72; D0-06DD1-D versions prior to 2.72; D0-06DD2-D versions prior to 2.72; D0-06DR-D versions prior to 2.72;
